column4: Does anyone have a general idea as to what sort of throughput I should receive downloading from the University of Waterloo mirror? I'm getting ~20KB/s and I think I should be getting more. It might be a network issue, but since I cannot manually select a mirror, I cannot test other servers.
you might try Bittorrent, speed should be fast from that
And bittorrent won't help when downloading packages from a repository.
